tv.amwa.maj.io.mxf.impl

Class RandomIndexPackImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • tv.amwa.maj.io.mxf.impl.RandomIndexPackImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, MetadataObject, MXFUnit, RandomIndexPack

    @MediaClass(uuid1=218169857,
            uuid2=273,
            uuid3=256,
            uuid4={6,14,43,52,2,5,1,1},
            definedName="RandomIndexPack",
            description="A device to help find partitions scattered throughout an MXF file.",
            namespace="http://www.smpte-ra.org/rp210",
            prefix="mxf",
            symbol="RandomIndexPack")
public class RandomIndexPackImpl
extends Object
implements MetadataObject, Serializable, Cloneable, RandomIndexPack

    Random index pack data for an MXF file.

    See Also:
    PartitionImpl, PartitionInformation, Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • getPartitionIndex

        @MediaProperty(uuid1=251658240,
               uuid2=0,
               uuid3=115,
               uuid4={6,14,43,52,0,0,0,0},
               definedName="PartitionIndex",
               typeName="RandomIndexItemArray",
               optional=false,
               uniqueIdentifier=false,
               symbol="PartitionIndex")
public RandomIndexItem[] getPartitionIndex()
        Description copied from interface: RandomIndexPack

        Returns the array random index items of this random index pack. Each partition of the MXF file indexed should have an entry in this array. The array is ordered by the byte offset of the partition.

        Specified by:
        getPartitionIndex in interface RandomIndexPack
        Returns:
        Array of random index items of this random index pack.
        See Also:
        PartitionPack.getThisPartition(), TypeDefinitions.RandomIndexItem, TypeDefinitions.RandomIndexItemArray

      • setPartitionIndex

        @MediaPropertySetter(value="PartitionIndex")
public void setPartitionIndex(RandomIndexItem[] partitionIndex)
                                                                    throws NullPointerException
        Description copied from interface: RandomIndexPack

        Sets the array of random index items of this random index pack. Each partition of the MXF file indexed should have an entry in this array. The items will be sorted into byte offset order.

        Specified by:
        setPartitionIndex in interface RandomIndexPack
        Parameters:
        partitionIndex - Array of random index items of this random index pack.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - Cannot set the partition index with a null array.

      • lookupPartitionOffsets

        @UInt64Array
public long[] lookupPartitionOffsets(@UInt32
                                                  int bodySID)
        Description copied from interface: RandomIndexPack

        Returns an ordered list of the byte offsets for partitions containing the given body stream identifier. The order of the partitions is the play order of the essence contained in the essence streams.

        Specified by:
        lookupPartitionOffsets in interface RandomIndexPack
        Parameters:
        bodySID - Body stream identifier to query the partition offsets for.
        Returns:
        List of byte offsets to partitions containing part of the given body SID.

      • count

        @MediaPropertyCount(value="PartitionIndex")
public int count()
        Description copied from interface: RandomIndexPack

        Returns the number of partitions indexed by this random index pack.

        Specified by:
        count in interface RandomIndexPack
        Returns:
        Number of partitions indexed by this random index pack.

      • clear

        @MediaPropertyClear(value="PartitionIndex")
public void clear()
        Description copied from interface: RandomIndexPack

        Clears the partition table within this random index pack.

        Specified by:
        clear in interface RandomIndexPack

      • addRandomIndexItem

        public void addRandomIndexItem(@UInt32
                               int bodySID,
                               @UInt64
                               long byteOffset)
                        throws IllegalArgumentException
        Description copied from interface: RandomIndexPack

        Add a random index item to this pack by its body stream identifier and byte offset. A random index item describes the location of a partition and which body stream it contains data for.

        Specified by:
        addRandomIndexItem in interface RandomIndexPack
        Parameters:
        bodySID - Body stream identifier of the partition.
        byteOffset - Byte offset of the partition in the file, measured from the beginning of the header partition.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Cannot set the body stream identifier or the byte offset to a negative value.
        See Also:
        RandomIndexPack.addRandomIndexItem(RandomIndexItem), PartitionPack.getThisPartition(), PartitionPack.getBodySID()

      • addRandomIndexItem

        public void addRandomIndexItem(RandomIndexItem randomPartitionItem)
                        throws NullPointerException
        Description copied from interface: RandomIndexPack

        Add an existing random index item to this pack. A random index item describes the location of a partition and which body stream it contains data for.

        Specified by:
        addRandomIndexItem in interface RandomIndexPack
        Parameters:
        randomPartitionItem - Item to add to this pack.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - Cannot add a null index item.
        See Also:
        RandomIndexPack.addRandomIndexItem(int, long)

      • writeAsBytes

        public int writeAsBytes(ByteBuffer buffer)
                 throws NullPointerException,
                        InsufficientSpaceException
        Description copied from interface: RandomIndexPack

        Serializes this random index pack into its file-based KLV-encoded version in the given buffer. The buffer must have at least RandomIndexPack.getLength() bytes remaining.

        Specified by:
        writeAsBytes in interface RandomIndexPack
        Parameters:
        buffer - Buffer to write this random index pack into.
        Returns:
        Number of bytes written.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - Cannot write this random index pack to a null buffer.
        InsufficientSpaceException - The given buffer does not have sufficient space remaining.
        See Also:
        RandomIndexPack.getLength()
